profile.title: Umwirondoro w’Ukoresha
profile.mustLogin: Ugomba kwinjira (kwiyandikisha) kugira ngo urebe amagenamiterere.
profile.noPrivateKey: Nta mfunguzo y’ibanga iri kuri iki gikoresho yo koherezwa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Shyiraho ijambobanga ryo kurinda kopi y’ububikoshingiro:
profile.importSuccess: Urufunguzo rw’ibanga rwinjijwe kuri iki gikoresho.
profile.importFailed: Kwinjiza urufunguzo byanze (ijambobanga si ryo cyangwa dosiye yangiritse).
profile.keysRotated: Imfunguzo nshya zakozwe kandi iya rubanda yoherejwe.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Urufunguzo rwawe rw’ibanga ntirurenga iki gikoresho. Sohora kopi irinzwe n’ijambobanga kugira ngo uyisubizemo ku kindi gikoresho.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Uri kuri Free—koresha amahitamo ya Sun/Moon yo hepfo. Kuzamura (Upgrade) kugira ngo ufungure izindi ntema (themes).
profile.backupDesc: Kora kopi zirinzwe n’ijambobanga z’imfunguzo zawe, hanyuma uzisubize ku kindi gikoresho kugira ngo uhuze.
profile.followHint: Inkuru zabo zizagaragara muri Following yawe nibanditse ku Bakurikira (Followers) cyangwa ku Buri wese (Public).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Hari ikibazo cyabaye muri iki gice.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Ohereza amahamagara n’ubutumwa binyura kuri nimero/emeli byawe byemejwe. Uhamagara/usohora ubutumwa bishobora kugaragaza nimero yawe ya Chatforia.
profile.errE164: Andika nimero ya telefoni yemewe (E.164), urugero +15551234567.
profile.errSmsDest: Hitamo nibura aho byoherezwa kumwe (telefoni cyangwa email).
profile.errQuietHours: Amasaha yo gutuza agomba kuba hagati ya 0 na 23.

chat.selectPrompt: Hitamo ubutumwa cyangwa icyumba kugira ngo utangire kuganira
chat.emptySubtitle: Ohereza ubutumwa kugira ngo utangire ikiganiro.

status.filesNote: Kugeza kuri dosiye 5. Mburabuzi irangira mu masaha 24.

premium.heading: Jya kuri Premium
premium.description: Fungura imikorere ikomeye & kuraho amasegonda y’amamaza.

auth.headline: Ubutumwa bwizewe, ku isi hose, buhindurwa ako kanya
auth.description: End-to-end encryption, ubusobanuro (translation) bukoresha AI, ubutumwa buzimangana, n’amajwi/videwo.

feature.privacy: Privacy imbere: Amakuru yawe, uburenganzira bwawe.

auth.desktopTip: Uri kuri mudasobwa? Sikanisha telefoni yawe kugira ngo ubone porogaramu.
auth.subhead: Ubutumwa bw’ibanga, buhindurwa, kandi butekanye—ako kanya.
auth.tip: Ushobora gukoresha Chatforia ku gikoresho icyo ari cyo cyose—cyangwa ukamanura porogaramu kugira ngo ubone uburambe bwiza.
auth.scanHint: Sikana kugira ngo ukuremo porogaramu cyangwa ufungure mu mfuruka yawe.

home.title: Ahabanza
home.subheader: Ohereza ubutumwa kugira ngo utangire ikiganiro.

press.title: Itangazamakuru
press.contactText: Kubaza ku itangazamakuru, twandikire kuri press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia ni ubutumwa bwizewe bufite ubusobanuro ako kanya na E2E encryption, bugamije koroshya ibiganiro by’ibanga ku isi.
press.assetsText: Amalogora, amafoto ya ecran, n’amashusho y’umusaruro (biraza).

careers.title: Imirimo
careers.intro: Turi itsinda rito ryubaka ubutumwa mpuzamahanga bw’ibanga. Niba witaye ku mutekano, koroherezwa, na UX nziza, twishimira kukumva.
careers.openRoles: Injeniyeri (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.
careers.apply: Uburyo bwo kwiyandikisha: Ohereza CV/ amalink kuri jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Ibyerekeye Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ni ubutumwa bwizewe, bw’indimi nyinshi bufite end-to-end encryption, ubusobanuro ako kanya, n’amajwi/ videwo. Intego yacu: gufasha abantu guhuza—mu ibanga, mu mutekano, no mu ndimi zose.

values.privacy: Ubuzima bwite imbere: E2E encryption ku buryo busanzwe.
values.access: Kuboneka kuri bose: Hindura indimi 100+ mu buryo bwikora.
values.control: Igenzura: Ubutumwa buzimangana & ko byasomwe ni amahitamo.

about.howDescription: Ubutumwa buhishwa (encrypt) kuri kimwe cyawe mbere yo koherezwa. Ubusobanuro, ububikoshingiro, no guhuza ibikoresho byatekerejweho kugabanya ibyo seriveri zacu zibona.

advertise.title: Amamaza kuri Chatforia
advertise.description: Geraho abakoresha ubutumwa binyura mu myanya yumvikana kandi yizewe ku kirango. Dutanga banner zigaragara neza, ubufatanye, n’amamaza y’imbere mu rugo. Abakiriya ba Premium ntibabona amamaza.

adsense.withPubId: Ubu dukoresha Google AdSense. Niba wifuza kutugeraho binyuze muri Google Ads, koresha publisher ID {{pubId}} kandi usabe placement igenzurwa kuri izi unit hasi. Hari na sponsorships z’ako kanya—koresha ifishi.
adsense.noPubId: Ubu dukoresha Google AdSense. Hari na sponsorships zo kuhagera—koresha ifishi hasi.

advertise.noPlacements: Nta myanya ishyizweho ubu. Yongerwe muri ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Gusubiramo kenshi no kumara igihe kinini muri chat UI
why.brandSafe: Imiterere yizewe ku kirango; gucunga imiterere y’ubwinshi
why.sponsoredMoments: Igihe gisponsors (nko “Start a Chat” modal) kiraboneka
why.deals: Amasezerano ya kureba cyangwa binyuze muri AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Urakoze! Ubutumwa bwawe turabwakira. Tuzagusubiza vuba.
form.mailtoInfo: Gufungura porogaramu ya email kugira ngo wohereze ubusabe bwawe…
form.budgetLabel: Ingengo y’imari ya buri kwezi (si ngombwa)
form.messagePlaceholder: Intego, amatariki, KPI, n’aho wifuza gushyira…

upgrade.title: Kuzamura (Upgrade)
upgrade.subtitle: Hitamo paki ikubereye: Plus ikuraho amamaza, Premium iguha imikorere yose ikomeye.

gettingStarted.title: Gutangira
gettingStarted.subtitle: Uri mushya kuri Chatforia? Iyi nyandiko igaragaza iby’ingenzi kugira ngo ube witeguye mu minota mike.

alert.text: Iyi ndaya iziyongera uko dushyiraho ibiranga bishya. Niba hari ibibuze, tubarize kuri

section2.title: 2) Tangira ubutumwa
section2.item1: Fungura DM cyangwa Itsinda wohereze ubutumwa bwa mbere.
section2.item2: Koresha ubusobanuro ako kanya kugira ngo ugirane ibiganiro mu ndimi 100+.
section2.item3: Gerageza ubutumwa buzimangana na ko byasomwe muri Umwirondoro → Ubuzima bwite.

section3.title: 3) Genda kure
section3.item1Part1: Tunganya paki yawe kuri paji ya
section3.item2Part1: Huza ibikoresho byiyongera kandi shyiraho ububikoshingiro bwihishe muri

account.q: Nigute nakora cyangwa nakiza konti yanjye?
account.a: Kura porogaramu cyangwa ukoreshe web, kanda “Fungura konti”, emeza email/telefoni. Kugira ngo ukize, kanda “Wibagiwe ijambobanga”.

privacy.a: Yego. Ubutumwa n’amahamagara bihishwa ku buryo bwa end-to-end. Ni wowe na nyirubwite mubusoma.

translate.a: Emeza “Hindura mu buryo bwikora” muri Amahindura → Isura & Ururimi. Duhindura kuri gikoresho aho bishoboka, ubundi binyuze mu API zizewe n’amakuru make cyane.

contact.a: Twandikire kuri support@chatforia.com. Shyiramo amashusho ya ecran n’inombora ya porogaramu ukoresha.

intro.body: Iyi Politiki isobanura uko Chatforia (“twe”) dukusanya, dukoresha, kandi dusangira amakuru igihe ukoresha porogaramu n’imirimo yacu. Dushushanya Chatforia tugamije kugabanya amakuru dushobora kubona.

infoWeCollect.title: Amakuru dukusanya
infoWeCollect.account: Amakuru ya konti (nko email/telefoni) yo gukora no kurinda konti yawe.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ibirimo byahishwe (ubutumwa/amahamagara) bihishwa mu buryo bwa end-to-end; ntitubisoma.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Ibipimo/ikoreshwa nka crash logs, ubwoko bw’igikoresho, cyangwa analytics byoroheje byo kunoza imikorere.

howWeUse.title: Uko dukoresha amakuru
howWeUse.provide: Gutanga no kurinda serivisi (kwinjira, kurwanya spam/urugomo).

sharing.title: Gusangira
sharing.body: Ntitugurisha amakuru y’abakoresha. Dushobora gusangira amakuru make n’abadukorera (nko push, analytics) mu masezerano akomeye.

rights.title: Uburenganzira bwawe
rights.body: Bitewe n’akarere kawe (nko GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ushobora gusaba kureba, gukosora, gusiba, cyangwa kwanga imikoresha imwe. Twandikire: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kubika & Umutekano
retention.body: Tubika gusa ibisabwa gukora serivisi kandi dukoresha umutekano usanzwe mu nganda. Ibirimo bya E2E ntitwabishobora gusoma.

children.title: Abana
children.body: Chatforia ntiyagenewe abana bari munsi ya 13 (cyangwa uko amategeko ahererejwe asaba).

changes.title: Impinduka
changes.body: Tuzashyira amatangazo hano kandi duhindure itariki ya “Byavuguruwe bwa nyuma”.

intro.body: Ukoresheje Chatforia wemera aya Mategeko. Niba utayemera, ntukoreshe serivisi.

accounts.title: Konti
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Tanga amakuru nyayo kandi urinde imyirondoro yawe.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Uraryozwa ibikorwa bikorerwa kuri konti yawe.

acceptableUse.title: Imikoreshereze Iremewe
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Ntamabara, ibitemewe, cyangwa ibirimo byica uburenganzira; nta spam cyangwa ikoreshwa ry’ikoranabuhanga mu buriganya.

yourContent.title: Ibirimo byawe
yourContent.body: Uragumana uburenganzira ku birimo byawe. Uduha uburenganzira bukenewe bwo gutwara serivisi (nko kohereza, kubika, guhindura).

disclaimer.title: Ibisobanuro & Inshingano
disclaimer.body: Serivisi itangwa “uko imeze” nta masezerano yihariye. Ku rwego rwinshi rutewe n’amategeko, Chatforia ntiyaryozwa igihombo kitaziguye cyangwa gikabije.

changes.title: Impinduka
changes.body: Dushobora kuvugurura aya mategeko; gukomeza gukoresha nyuma y’impinduka bisobanura kwemera.

doNotSell.title: Ntugurishe cyangwa Udasangize Amakuru Yanjye
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ntiigurisha amakuru y’abantu. Abaturage ba California barashobora gutanga ubusabe hakurikijwe CPRA bakoresheje buto hasi.

cookies.title: Imiterere ya Cookie
cookies.body: Chatforia ikoresha cookies nke (nko izo ku mwanya, umutekano). Ntitukoresha cookies z’amamaza z’uturere tw’abanyamahanga. Genzura cookies ukoresheje igenamiterere rya mushakisho wawe.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Nta nimero igenewe. Hitamo hakurikijwe area code kugira ngo utangire kohereza ubutumwa.

startChatModal.title: Tangira ikiganiro
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Andika izina, izina-ry’ukoresha, telefoni, cyangwa email…
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Andika izina-ry’ukoresha cyangwa telefoni hanyuma ukande Shakisha.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: Telefoni/email bizaboneka nyuma yo kubika nk’inshuti.

sounds.freeNotice: Uri kuri Free — amajwi ya Premium aragaragazwa ariko afunze. Kuzamura kugira ngo ufungure byose.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: Iyi mikorere isaba Paki ya Premium.

aiSettings.title: Amahindura ya AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Gena ubusobanuro, ibisubizo byihuse, na ForiaBot auto-responses.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Hindura mu buryo bwikora ubutumwa bwinjira
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Ohereza AI ubutumwa bwa vuba (bwoza) kugira ngo iguhe ibisubizo byihuse.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Pfuka amagambo mabi mu bitekerezo bya AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Nibiba biriho, ibitekerezo bya AI bizagaruka bipfutse amagambo mabi
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Emeza gusubiza byikora mpari mu kazi

accessibilitySettings.title: Kworoherezwa & Iburira
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Amahitamo afasha gukoresha Chatforia utagendeye ku majwi.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Itangirira ku rugero rusanzwe. Yongera niba ukunda inyuguti nini.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Iburira bigaragara ku butumwa & amahamagara
Erekana amabendera n’umutwe w’idirishya ublinkinga kugira ngo ntuhacikwe.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Telefoni ihinde ku butumwa bushya (aho bishoboka)
Tuma igikoresho gihinde hamwe n’iburira.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Erekana urumuri ku mahamagara yinjiye
Kwaka by’akanya gato iyo hari guhamagara.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Hindura mu nyandiko amajwi yinjiye
Ongeraho inyandiko ku majwi wakiriye.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Erekana amabendera n’umutwe ublinkinga kugira ngo ntuhacikwe.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Telefoni ihinde ku butumwa bushya (aho bishoboka)
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Kwaka by’akanya gato iyo hari guhamagara.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Bika gusa ciphertext kuri seriveri. Bizimya AI/Translate na preview yo kugenzura ibirimo.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Shakisha ku kazina, izina, izina-ry’ukoresha, cyangwa telefoni
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Sangira ihuza ryawe ryo gutumira kugira ngo mutangire kuganira ako kanya.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Gumana mu itumanaho ukoresheje Chatforia kuri iOS na Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Inama: Ubutumwa bwawe buhuza hagati ya web na mobile.

randomChat.title: Random Chat
randomChat.description: Hura n’undi muntu ako kanya. Tuzabahuza dufungure icyumba cy’agateganyo.
randomChat.saveGuard: Gukiza bishoboka gusa mu biganiro by’abantu babiri (si bot).
